00025 #include "OgreAnimation.h"
00026 #include "OgreKeyFrame.h"
00027 #include "OgreAnimationTrack.h"
00028 #include "OgreException.h"
00029 
00030 namespace Ogre {
00031 
00032     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00033     Animation::Animation(const String& name, Real length) : mName(name), mLength(length)
00034     {
00035     }
00036     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00037     Animation::~Animation()
00038     {
00039         destroyAllTracks();
00040     }
00041     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00042     Real Animation::getLength(void) const
00043     {
00044         return mLength;
00045     }
00046     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00047     AnimationTrack* Animation::createTrack(unsigned short handle)
00048     {
00049         AnimationTrack* ret;
00050 
00051         ret = new AnimationTrack(this);
00052 
00053         mTrackList[handle] = ret;
00054         return ret;
00055     }
00056     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00057     AnimationTrack* Animation::createTrack(unsigned short handle, Node* node)
00058     {
00059         AnimationTrack* ret = createTrack(handle);
00060 
00061         ret->setAssociatedNode(node);
00062 
00063         return ret;
00064     }
00065     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00066     unsigned short Animation::getNumTracks(void) const
00067     {
00068         return (unsigned short)mTrackList.size();
00069     }
00070     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00071     AnimationTrack* Animation::getTrack(unsigned short handle) const
00072     {
00073         TrackList::const_iterator i = mTrackList.find(handle);
00074 
00075         if (i == mTrackList.end())
00076         {
00077             Except(Exception::ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, 
00078                 "Cannot find track with the specified handle", 
00079                 "Animation::getTrackByHandle");
00080         }
00081 
00082         return i->second;
00083 
00084     }
00085     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00086     void Animation::destroyTrack(unsigned short handle)
00087     {
00088         TrackList::iterator i = mTrackList.find(handle);
00089 
00090         delete i->second;
00091 
00092         mTrackList.erase(i);
00093     }
00094     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00095     void Animation::destroyAllTracks(void)
00096     {
00097         TrackList::iterator i;
00098         for (i = mTrackList.begin(); i != mTrackList.end(); ++i)
00099         {
00100             delete i->second;
00101         }
00102         mTrackList.clear();
00103     }
00104     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00105     String Animation::getName(void) const
00106     {
00107         return mName;
00108     }
00109     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00110     void Animation::apply(Real timePos, Real weight)
00111     {
00112         TrackList::iterator i;
00113         for (i = mTrackList.begin(); i != mTrackList.end(); ++i)
00114         {
00115             i->second->apply(timePos, weight);
00116         }
00117 
00118 
00119     }
00120 
00121 }
